titles.title: For the relief of Matt Clawson.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 9/14/1995--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full settlement of claims against the United States for losses resulting from reliance on the approval of the Forest Service of his claim for a specified placer mine in the vicinity of Salmon River in Idaho.
